```{r}

Wisconsin_map <- get_map('Stevens Point, Wisconsin', zoom = 7, maptype = 'hybrid')

ggmap(Wisconsin_map)

```


```{r}




MME_lakes_of_wisconsin <- ggmap(Wisconsin_map) +
  geom_point(data = filter(main_data_wisconsin, MME == 1), aes(x = V1, V2))

color_seperated_lakes_of_wisconsin <- ggmap(Wisconsin_map) +
  geom_point(data = filter(main_data_wisconsin, MME == 0), aes(x = V1, V2), fill = 'blue', shape = 21)+
  geom_point(data = filter(main_data_wisconsin, MME == 1), aes(x = V1, V2), fill = 'red', shape = 21)
  
               

```


```{r}
shape_reg_predictions <- merge(shape_full, Reg_predictions, all = FALSE)

logreg_at_risk_lakes_of_wisconsin <- ggmap(Wisconsin_map) +
  geom_point(data = shape_reg_predictions, aes(x = V1, V2, color = log(Prob)))


```
